service.

We identify compelling investment opportunities, opening doors that might otherwise appear closed. We facilitate all aspects of deal execution.

Development
of the acquisition or sales strategy

Company analysis,
preparation of the investment memorandum

Undertaking comprehensive
industry and market researches

Identifying transaction opportunities
based on a client’s objectives and strategy

Determining an
appropriate valuation for the businesses, facilities and other assets

Serving as a intermediary in
negotiations
with any level of complexity to get the best possible price and terms

Providing counsel
to the clients in helping secure acquisitions, leading the due diligence process

Negotiating the
relevant legal documents,
drafting contracts and legal documentation

Managing PR
and reputation around the transaction

Continuing advice and support during the
post-acquisition period

our offer.

100% Clear-Cut Hit

We only identify companies that precisely match your brief, since we undertake comprehensive market research, we take every detail of your strategy into account and provide sustainable and efficient deal execution.

Active searching

We can approach shareholders directly so as to acquire «not for sale» or to sell for «not acquiring» targets.

Professionalism

For each project we establish a team of the best qualified professionals and experts with relevant expertise and knowledge.

Negotiations

We can help to get the best possible price and terms by ensuring responsive communication, high quality preparation, applying all our experience and skills.

Confidentiality

Maintaining confidentiality is our specialty and that’s why your information would not be shared with any third party without your written permission.

Guarantee

If we don't achieve the desired results, you pay nothing. There are few, if any advisers offering the same no risk offer.

Free support

We offer three months post-acquisition support at no extra cost.
